title: It took a thief to stop a thief
creator_credit: Randy Grinter, Walter Shaw, Media Productions and Is Your Home Safe Inc
brief_description: This video covers everything from criminal attitude to locks, alarm systems, lighting, windows and position of the house. The video explores ways in which your house can be made more secure. Hosted by Walter Shaw with Eddie Egan.
